text:
An FLSA Sec 7(f) plan which
is found to be valid may continue to operate during periods in which the work
of an employee is subject to CWHSSA provided that during those periods the
employee is paid in compliance with the OT provisions of CWHSSA.
html: An FLSA Sec 7(f) plan which is found to be valid may continue to operate during periods in which the work of an employee is subject to CWHSSA provided that during those periods the employee is paid in compliance with the OT provisions of CWHSSA.
